程序包 org.springframework.ui.context.support

Classes supporting the org.springframework.ui.context package.

请参阅: 说明

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    DelegatingThemeSource
    Empty ThemeSource that delegates all calls to the parent ThemeSource.
    ResourceBundleThemeSource
    ThemeSource implementation that looks up an individual ResourceBundle per theme.
    SimpleTheme
    Default Theme implementation, wrapping a name and an underlying MessageSource.
    UiApplicationContextUtils
    Utility class for UI application context implementations.

程序包org.springframework.ui.context.support的说明

Classes supporting the org.springframework.ui.context package. Provides support classes for specialized UI contexts, e.g. for web UIs.
